Configure e-Boks integration settings.

Scan interval: {min_scan}-{max_scan} minutes

data_description.scan_interval: How often to check for new messages
data_description.message_count: Number of individual message sensors to create (Besked 1, Besked 2, etc.)
data_description.notify_senders: Comma-separated list of sender names that trigger persistent notifications. Default: Skattestyrelsen, Kommune, Sundhed, NemKonto, Udbetaling Danmark
